tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_data (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_duration_minutes INT,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    passenger_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  mode_of_transport VARCHAR(50),
  distance FLOAT,
  duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern_description TEXT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE historic_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name TEXT,
    start_city TEXT,
    end_city TEXT,
    distance_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation_modes (
    mode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mode_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE route_histories (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    mode_id INT,
    distance_km FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES historic_routes(route_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mode_id) REFERENCES transportation_modes(mode_id)
)

CREATE TABLE HistoricalRoutes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TravelData (
    travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT REFERENCES HistoricalRoutes(route_id),
    travel_date DATE,
    travel_time TIME,
    passenger_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleInfo (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255),
    manufacture_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE DriverInfo (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name VARCHAR(255),
    driver_license VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    travel_id INT REFERENCES TravelData(travel_id),
    weather_condition VARCHAR(100),
    temperature FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
)
